summary: Starting college at UMass Boston as IT major; foundations and problem solving.
highlights: Established study workflow; first exposure to structured problem solving.

artifacts.title: Display Connector Catalog (VGA, DVI, HDMI, DP, Thunderbolt) — Group Project
artifacts.desc: Quick reference comparing purpose, ports, and trivia for common display connectors; collaborative class assignment.

artifacts.title: Devices Inventory — Group Project
artifacts.desc: Spreadsheet comparing our devices by specs and purpose.

artifacts.title: Packet Tracer — Project 8 (Tasks 1–6)
artifacts.desc: Configured end devices, deployed & cabled a small LAN, validated paths with PDUs, and documented physical/logical views.

artifacts.title: VirtualBox on Fedora — VM Setup Demo
artifacts.desc: Short screen recording showing I'm being introduced to Linux via Fedore in Virtual Box.

artifacts.title: My First Website — “Wlacien’s Favorite Hobby”
artifacts.desc: My first HTML page for IT 110 (Fall 2022): headings, images, and paragraphs—no frameworks.

summary: Second semester at UMass Boston; Intro to databases and networking.
highlights: Hands-on with ER modeling, mySQL and basic subnetting; Cisco Packet Tracer labs.

artifacts.title: Packet Tracer — Basic IP Config & Ping Validation
artifacts.desc: Configured PC0 (IP 192.168.100.1/24, GW/DNS 192.168.100.250), verified local pings (.250, .100), and confirmed cross-subnet ping to 192.168.101.1 fails as expected (no routing).

artifacts.title: Packet Tracer — HTTP Request Simulation & PDU Layer Analysis
artifacts.desc: Used Simulation mode to browse to 192.168.100.2, inspected the PDU, and identified Ethernet II → IPv4 → TCP → HTTP fields per the lab guide.

summary: Transferred to Florida International University (FIU): Staring to B.S. in Cybersecurity.

term: Spring 2025 — My hardest semester at college
